message: Hello Bob, I am offering you my unique product for $115. I believe this price reflects its value and I hope it works for you.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm very interested in your product, but $115 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $105?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer at $110 for the product. I hope this price aligns better with your budget.
Hi Alice, thanks for countering. I'm getting closer to being able to afford it. How about $108?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to accept $109 for the product. I believe this price respects both our interests.
